title: FIB: User Handling and Authentication
description:
Business Scope:
As a user of the FIB tool I want a seemless connection between the tool invoking the FIB tool (currently PANDA) on basis of my EntraID and the rights being set for me
acceptance_criteria: the user can work seamlessly, changing from SAP CPQ to the FIB Tool (the locations tab) back and forth
The authentication is handed over (see logs)
